samples.question: [Transcript chunk 4]
samples.transcript: In my country well chef is popular because a lot of people like they establish restaurants and i think this is popular but not as much as other country i think because chef is still in korea not really i for my idea like not really good for pay okay all right let us go on to the third part of the test sure let us keep going right yeah what kind of jobs do children want to have in the future well you know children has a lot of ideas they have very funny and amazing like think about job and i think most of his president or they want to become superman or better like stone i think it is really cute and do you think parents should advise their children about their future career well yes for sure parents need to support them because the children need to dream whatever they want however i think the teenager until 15 like the parent to let them know what is the right way to like successful in the future okay do you think teenagers like to listen to their parents regarding job and future career i think depends on the personality but for me is different from my mood like if i happy i listen well but if i feel not good i did not listen yeah but their children need to listen to their parents sure exactly and do you think children or teenagers like to choose the same profession as their parents well no because if the parents refers to their like dream to children i think not really good so if children want to become a good like provider kind of parent surely the parents will support but it is still i think it is not really a good idea.
